sentences.sContent: Fourteen people, waiting to be hanged for the murder of a former prime minister, have been reprieved.
sentences.sCn: 因谋杀前总理而等受绞刑的十四个人获得缓刑。

remMethod.val: re (重新) + prieve (拿) → 重新捉拿归案 → 不执行死刑 → 缓刑

trans.tranOther: to officially stop a prisoner from being killed as a punishment
